info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 11:13AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Schenectady, northeastern Albany, southeastern Saratoga and northwestern Rensselaer Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1113 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Schenectady, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in urban and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Albany, Schenectady, Troy, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Cohoes, Watervliet, Colonie, Mechanicville, Latham, Guilderland, Niskayuna, Green Island, Waterford, Center Brunswick, Halfmoon, Stillwater, Shakers, Willow Glen and Pleasantdale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 25. Interstate 890 between exits 4b and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 2 and 7, and between exits 8A and 9. Interstate 787 near exit 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
